events.message: A customer reported a car collision that occurred on the highway last night and filed a claim for damages.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and details provided by the claimant.
An agent experienced in handling vehicle collisions was assigned to manage this auto accident claim promptly.
Acknowledgment of the claim was sent to the customer with information on next steps and required documentation.
The agent requested further documents including the police report, photos of vehicle damage, and medical bills if any injuries occurred.
Customer submitted all requested documents, including the accident police report and detailed photos of the damaged vehicle.
Investigation into the circumstances of the collision commenced to verify the claim and assess liability and damages.
Investigation concluded confirming the details of the collision and extent of vehicle damage based on collected evidence.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer based on the evaluation of damage and repair costs.
The customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed appreciation for the prompt service.
Formal approval of the claim was granted following acceptance of the proposed settlement by the claimant.
The payment amounting to the agreed settlement was issued and processed to the customerâ€™s account without delays.
The claim file was closed after ensuring all settlements were completed and no further actions were pending.
The complete claim records were archived securely for future reference and compliance purposes.
